attributes.additional_details: we want the government to address our cause and if we get enough signatures we can make this a reality and start changing our children's lives for the better.m
attributes.background: we was to prevent child crime by going into school doing workshop and talking to youths to get a insight in their home life. If we are concerned about a child we can contact social services or even get them counselling , creating a safer and a brighter future for all children.

rejection.details: Petitions need to contain a clear request for action from th eGovernment or Parliament.
